content: खर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (<ab>opp.</ab> मृदु, श्लक्ष्ण, द्रव) {@--1@} Hard, rough, solid. {@--2@} Severe, sharp, strict; <ls>R. 8. 9</ls>; स्मरः खरः खलः कांतः <ls>Kāv. 1. 59.</ls> {@--3@} Pungent, acid. {@--4@} Dense, thick. {@--5@} Hurtful, injurious, cutting, smart (words). {@--6@} Sharpedged; देहि खरनयनशरघातं <ls>Gīt. 10.</ls> {@--7@} Hot; खरांशुः &c. {@--8@} Cruel. --रः {@--1@} An ass; <ls>Ms. 2. 201</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">4. 115</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 4.">120</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">8. 370</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 160.</ls> {@--2@} A mule. {@--3@} A heron. {@--4@} A crow. {@--5@} A kind of prickly nightshade. {@--6@} A quadrangular mound of earth for receiving the sacrificial vessels. {@--7@} A Daitya or demon in general. {@--8@} An attendant of ({%a%}) Sūrya, ({%b%}) Śiva. {@--9@} <ab>N.</ab> of a demon, half-brother of Rāvaṇa and slain by Rāma; <ls>R. 12. 42.</ls>
